languages.text: "И мы разыскиваем те реликвии, что были утрачены. Ни ковен еретиков, ни самый страшный мир смерти не удержит сестер Пронатус, если их цель — возвращение великого наследия {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} в руки верных".

traits.locale_text: "И мы разыскиваем те реликвии, что были утрачены. Ни ковен еретиков, ни самый страшный мир смерти не удержит сестер Пронатус, если их цель — возвращение великого наследия {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} в руки верных".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."
languages.original_text: "И мы разыскиваем те реликвии, что были утрачены. Ни ковен еретиков, ни самый страшный мир смерти не удержит сестер Пронатус, если их цель — возвращение великого наследия {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} в руки верных".

traits.locale_text: "And we seek out the relics that were lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the Imperium into the hands of the faithful."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And we seek out the relics that were lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the Imperium into the hands of the faithful."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the Imperium into the hands of the faithful."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the Imperium into the hands of the faithful."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “不仅如此，我们还会寻找已经遗失的圣物。一旦普罗图斯修女下定决心，决定将{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的伟大遗产送回信徒的手中，那无论是异端分子，还是最危险的死亡世界，都无法阻止她们。”
languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此，我们还会寻找已经遗失的圣物。一旦普罗图斯修女下定决心，决定将{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的伟大遗产送回信徒的手中，那无论是异端分子，还是最危险的死亡世界，都无法阻止她们。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the Imperium into the hands of the faithful."

languages.text: «También buscamos las reliquias que se pierden. Ni un cónclave de herejes ni el mundo letal más peligroso son capaces de detener a las hermanas Pronatus cuando el objetivo es devolver parte del gran legado del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} a manos de los fieles».
languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: «También buscamos las reliquias que se pierden. Ni un cónclave de herejes ni el mundo letal más peligroso son capaces de detener a las hermanas Pronatus cuando el objetivo es devolver parte del gran legado del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} a manos de los fieles».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、我々は失われた聖遺物を探し求めているのだ。異端者の集まりも、邪悪な死地世界も、考古修道会の目的が{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の偉大な遺産の一部を信徒の手に取り戻すことにある限り、それを阻むことはできはしない」
languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、我々は失われた聖遺物を探し求めているのだ。異端者の集まりも、邪悪な死地世界も、考古修道会の目的が{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の偉大な遺産の一部を信徒の手に取り戻すことにある限り、それを阻むことはできはしない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Und wir suchen die Relikte, die verloren gegangen sind. Weder ein Zirkel von Ketzern noch die schlimmste aller Todeswelten kann die Pronatus-Schwestern aufhalten, wenn sie ein Stück des großen Vermächtnisses des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} wieder in die Hände der Gläubigen zu legen versuchen."
languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Und wir suchen die Relikte, die verloren gegangen sind. Weder ein Zirkel von Ketzern noch die schlimmste aller Todeswelten kann die Pronatus-Schwestern aufhalten, wenn sie ein Stück des großen Vermächtnisses des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} wieder in die Hände der Gläubigen zu legen versuchen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Et nous cherchons les reliques qui ont été égarées. Qu'il s'agisse d'une foule d'hérétiques ou du plus traître des mondes hostiles, rien n'arrête les Sœurs Pronatus lorsqu'elles ont pour objectif de replacer un héritage majeur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} entre les mains des fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: « Et nous cherchons les reliques qui ont été égarées. Qu'il s'agisse d'une foule d'hérétiques ou du plus traître des mondes hostiles, rien n'arrête les Sœurs Pronatus lorsqu'elles ont pour objectif de replacer un héritage majeur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} entre les mains des fidèles. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ayrıca kayıp yadigârları bulmak da bizim görevimizdir. Söz konusu {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} yüce miraslarını inananlara iade etmek olduğunda ne kâfir sürüleri ne de ölüm dünyaları, Pronatus Rahibeleri'ni bu yoldan çevirebilir."
languages.original_text: "And we seek out the relics that have been lost. Neither a coven of heretics nor the most wicked death world can deter Sisters Pronatus when their goal is to return a piece of the great legacy of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} into the hands of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca kayıp yadigârları bulmak da bizim görevimizdir. Söz konusu {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un yüce miraslarını inananlara iade etmek olduğunda ne kâfir sürüleri ne de ölüm dünyaları, Pronatus Rahibeleri'ni bu yoldan çevirebilir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
